name: sand-force

effect.black_white: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon's rock-, ground-, and steel-type moves have 1.3× their base power. This Pokémon does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.
effect.black_2_white_2: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon's rock-, ground-, and steel-type moves have 1.3× their base power. This Pokémon does not take sandstorm damage, regardless of type.

short_effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm. Protects against sandstorm damage.

flavor_text.black_white: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Boosts certain moves’ power in a sandstorm.
